title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about Eventbrite’s acquirer | TechCrunch
description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.
content:
Milan-based tech conglomerate Bending Spoons this week acquired Eventbrite for $500 million, adding the event ticketing platform to its growing portfolio of recognizable consumer tech brands.
